website_summaries.verdict: In the speedy, stylish P65 Creator, MSI reskins its GS65 Stealth Thin gaming laptop to appeal to 2D and 3D designers and animators—an audience that would appreciate a greater-than-1080p screen and a roomier SSD.
pros: Work-minded, but also quite suitable for gaming
cons: No high-res (beyond 1080p) screen or Core i9 option
SSD needlessly divided into small partitions

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a young professional
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a well tailored sleeve, thin microfiber cloth, and power brick in a fine wood box. This laptop is stellar. From Port options to display quality to performance, it is a top notch product. I use this professionally as a landscape architect for drafting and rendering and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dad

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Laptop so Far
customer_reviews.text: Im not much of a PC gamer but I gotta say this lil’ guy tempts me. I bought this computer mainly to design as I am a Fashion Design major and I gotta day it’s fast and accurate. But I gotta say the battery life isn’t great which was expected as it is an extremely powerful and portable laptop. I have run Fortnite and Apex and it looks better than my 4K tv. There something about that Full HD 15.6” screen that’s make the games feel quicker and sharper. I’ve only had for a week or so but truly amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Lacks Thunderbolt 3
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this laptop after doing a search for thunderbolt 3 laptop on amazon only to find out that this version of the MSI p65 creator is NOT one of the models with Thunderbolt 3 if it was, I would still have it. I really liked it, I wanted to keep it, but it wasn't what I need long term.
customer_reviews.author: S. Macnab

customer_reviews.title: Gtx 1060 is okay but still relevant
customer_reviews.text: This laptop has a very nice foot print while also allowing for excellent thermals while gaming. I love my purchase of the MSI P65.
customer_reviews.author: Vuittle

customer_reviews.title: My Daily Workhorse
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this P65 for heavy geoprocessing tasks with large LiDAR datasets on a daily basis for the past 6 months and cannot be happier. I spent a few days sussing out other laptops online and was reluctant to purchase anything I saw, knowing that I needed a machine that could easily accomplish heavy graphics processing and spatial analysis. I took a chance, never previously owning an MSI, and can confidently say they made a truly great product with the P65. If you are a creative professional that requires a box that can handle heavy processing workloads, take this P65 with the best specs you can afford out for a spin. You'll dig it.
customer_reviews.author: C.M.

customer_reviews.title: Decent Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the laptop with the 1060 6G. I found it to fit my needs perfectly. I am a student getting ready to go to college, and I needed a laptop that I could use for gaming as well as day to day tasks. The laptop is definitely gaming ready, and I am able to hit 60 fps on virtually anything. The only complaint I have is the battery life. It has an 8 hour advertised battery, but I am finding that it only gets about 4.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Not a big fan
customer_reviews.text: This laptop seems to have it all - good specs, lightweight design, high resolution screen - but the fans have always been a problem for me. Even when I first bought this laptop, the fans got quite loud and the laptop got pretty hot. A year later, I'm working from home every day, like most people, and the fans have drastically worsened. It's like someone is digging into your laptop with a mini jackhammer, even after cleaning. This shouldn't be happening after a little over one year. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Steve K

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the buck! But there is a catch
customer_reviews.text: It is light weight, has powerful hardware specs and a reasonable battery life. After using it for about 2 months, it's fan started making weird rattling noises. Turns out it was a manufacturing defect. The good part is that their customer support is really good. My laptop's fan got replaced free of cost since it was still in warranty and I received it back from them within 12 days.
customer_reviews.author: ZJ

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop, great price.
customer_reviews.text: This laptop has met my expectations. I use it for multi-track audio recording and some light video work, and it handles everything I've thrown at it without flinching.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Laptop
customer_reviews.text: I bought this computer for my daughter and it’s nothing but problems. Arrived and appeared to be used. Emailed company with no response. Now after a few months and very limited use the webcam does not work. The cursor and trackpad constantly freeze.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole K

customer_reviews.title: More space
customer_reviews.text: Do wish it had more space! Wanted to play one particular game and it didnt fit on there
customer_reviews.author: Kim Modica

customer_reviews.title: Can’t get through to support to replace broken laptop
customer_reviews.text: Just received the product, screen was broken as soon as I turned it on. Haven’t been able to get through to customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be Carefull, Risk of fire. MSI will not respond.
customer_reviews.text: Looks all great on paper and specs but less than an year smoked and the battery start failing expanding inside of the laptop. Risk of fire. I contacted MSI and no replys. Ill check if I can still return for change since the returning window expired.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Fragile but capable and premium
customer_reviews.text: This product seems very fragile and the surface is prone to scratches. That said, the battery life is decent, it is very powerful and thin for the price, and the screen is very bright.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Devine
